name: Beacon Street Capital
overview:
Beacon Street Capital, LLC, an independent investment advisor located in Atlanta, Georgia, was founded in 2001 to acquire the proprietary stock selection formulas and methodology created by Terry Burke. Mr. Burke has used this quantitative/qualitative methodology successfully since developing it in 1992, and continues his portfolio management style as co-portfolio manager for Beacon Street Capital.

We are an active, growth oriented large-cap manager but we do not exclude “value” stocks with strong growth potential. Our investment objectives are accomplished by exploiting market inefficiencies related to security-specific accounting anomalies applied to a long-only equity strategy. We offer three investment strategies as Separately Managed Accounts:

Institutional LCG: Large-cap growth strategy designed to generate excess returns with a high correlation to its benchmark while being fully invested through all market cycles.

S&P500/Select: Large-cap growth strategy which seeks consistent excess returns from stocks selected from the S&P500, with a default to cash to lower volatility. This product is suitable for conservative investors with a time horizon of 5 years and who seek growth and dividend income.

DowJones/Select: Mega-cap growth strategy which seeks consistent excess returns from stocks chosen from the Dow Jones Industrial Average, with a default to cash to lower volatility. This product is suitable for conservative investors with a time horizon of 5 years and who seek growth and higher dividend income.
